sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react' function TableForm({ description, setDescription, rate, setRate, price, setPrice, amount, setAmount, }) { useEffect(() => { const calculateAmount = (amount) => { setAmount(rate * price) } calculateAmount(amount) }, [amount, rate, price, setAmount]) return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setRate(e.target.value)} />
setPrice(e.target.value)} />

{}

) } export default TableForm
